title: Find the equation of ellipse a) center (0,0) focus= (3,0) vertex=(5,0)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Note that the ellipse’s center, focus, and vertex all lie on the same horizontal line (the x axis, in this case). This tells us that the ellipse is wider than it is tall; its semimajor axis is horizontal. The focus is 3 units to the right of the center, so c = 3. The vertex is 5 units to the right of the center, so a = 5.
